articles.author: Pritha Mallick
articles.title: EU Drug Watchdog Approves World's First RSV Infant Vaccine - News18
articles.description: RSV normally causes mild, cold-like symptoms, but can be serious for infants the elderly, those with weak immune systems and underlying conditions, and is a leading cause of paediatric hospitalisation in Europe
articles.content: Europes drug watchdog on Friday approved the worlds first vaccine for infants against the Respiratory Syncytial Virus, a major cause of child hospitalisation on the continent, the Amsterdam-based age… [+1836 chars]
